==  '''Data policy with Hirlam-B data portal''' ==
In an effort to promote closer operational cooperation between NWP services, especially those involved in HIRLAM cooperation, and improve on monitoring of real-time operational HIRLAM and HARMONIE forecasts, Hirlam programme has over the past years worked on an establishment of hirlam data portal which is primarily hosted at https://hirlam.org. At current stage, the main emphasis of the data portal is on enabling of near real-time joint operational HIRLAM/HARMONIE monitoring and model inter-comparison. Where applicable, the set up will be extended further to cover suitable observations and forecasts provided by other participating data providers, including enabling of operational data exchange when conditions permits.

The web content of the hirlam data portal is available to the entire hirlam community, including that of the cooperation partners in Meteo France and ALADIN community. Users outside of this community may acquire access by contacting HIRLAM-B programme. The presentation materials and data featured in the hirlam data portal may not be used for non-research purpose. Publication with reference to the presented data portal materials need to be agreed in advance, with due acknowledge made to hirlam-B and data providers. For the raw observation and forecast data, the ownership remains at data providers.
